message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,200 is still below my minimum.  I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,500?
